LanguageData.ARA_Chrony.label: "Warrior Type" Crony
LanguageData.ARA_Chrony.description: Cronies are the rulers of the Arachne warrior species, and although small, they are extremely aggressive, launching more powerful large-scale attacks each cycle.They also keep fewer visitors and passing wanderers, and will not dispatch the Man in Black even if the colony is about to fall.
